title: Review regarding the App!
text: This app is awesome for the simple fact that if you‚Äôre a person that orders practically everything needed off the internet which most likely means there‚Äôs times you have multiple orders being shipped from different stores at the same time you can track them all by simply opening this app and adding the tracking number. Very straight forward app layout an very easy to navigate. Another great feature about this app is when I enter the tracking number it knows the store the order was purchased from and saves them for you so if you want to shop them stores again you can by the press of a button. All in all it‚Äôs a great app for someone that orders off the internet and the packages have the option to be tracked it can all be done in one place an that‚Äôs this app. üëçüèºüëçüèºüëçüèºüòé

title: Going down hill
text: I‚Äôve used this app for about two years I think? I just got off the phone with customer service because I was unable to use the four payment option due to my number not being up-to-date‚Ä¶ Which doesn‚Äôt make any sense because it clearly is on my end. I humored them and ‚Äúupdated‚Äù it on the website and they told me that my old phone number is still on the screen. I‚Äôm not mad at them because they only did what they could but I‚Äôm mad at the developers of this app because lately it seems like this is becoming more of a hassle to use than a convenience. not only that, but I have made purchases continuously with the Shop pay option on websites with my card attached and when I go on the app and go to the Wallet section, my card is nowhere to be found. I don‚Äôt understand what‚Äôs going on. but I do know I will have to go download Afterpay because there‚Äôs no other way for me to do what I want to do now.

title: Great app, continues getting better
text:
Tried a few delivery tracking apps over the years. This wasn‚Äôt my go-to at first, but now is the only one I use. I like that many of the online stores I frequent integrate with this app, and it seems quick to load and update. A few suggestions: toggle on/off map view with deliveries, as these take up screen space and not always useful; sort by real-time delivery date so easier to know at a glance what‚Äôs pending delivery for a given day; add share to Shop option from within Safari, such as sharing a page with tracking info and have Shop automatically detect and add to list (rather than manually copying and pasting). 

Keep up the great work, dev team. Thanks for making a solid app that continues getting better.

title: amazing
text: this app is THE APP for deliveries. way back when, i used to download so many different tracking apps, as one wouldnt have a feature that the other had (notifications, map, etc.). i tried this app and it was the tracking app to kill tracking apps. the interface is just beautiful. the layout isnt boring and its fun in its own way. the fact that it can detect deliveries on its own is just a breeze. its built-in map feature lets me keep track on where my packages are. the notifications are up to date and fun. when the packages deliver, the best part is the little confetti that the app gives you üí´. the only ‚Äúproblem‚Äù i have with the app is the colors. before, the app‚Äôs main color was blue. now its purple. it would be nice if the Arrive lets you choose between colors. besides that, everything is perfect

title: More frustrating than helpful
text:
One of the sites I ordered from told me to use this app to track my delivery. Of course, it linked all of my incoming orders from other places which in theory sounds amazing! However, if you order more than 2 things max good luck trying to figure out which tracking number belongs to which order. My 2 biggest complaints with this app are as follows:
1. Only lists the tracking number, no other corresponding information about which package it is so I have to go to the original shop just to figure out what they are
2. The tracking is out of date. As of current it shows I have 4 packages; 1 delivered and 3 of which are in transit. This is annoying considering I should only have 2 so now I have to dig through all the orders to figure out which ones are accurate and relevant to me. 

Gave this app 1 star because as soon as my package arrives from the shop that required me to use this app I‚Äôm deleting it. Easier to track from each individual site and use their projected delivery date than use this app

title: A really beautiful package tracker
text:
This is a really great app. The UI is fluid and beautiful. It‚Äôs simple to pickup and use. I like that it pulls in shipments on its own and lets you add them manually in a pretty simple way. I really don‚Äôt have any outright complaints for the app especially with it being free. 

For the future (and I know in your FAQ you mention adding other mail providers) but I would like to be able to add multiple gmail accounts to search for shipments through. For example I have a primary and secondary gmail account and I buy products through each. So it would be nice to have Arrive see both accounts and either show all in one list or break them out (or both!) I don‚Äôt mind adding the less used accounts shipments manually as is. Just something to think about. 

Thanks for the fantastic app regardless! :)

title: So there I was
text: It was 4 am in Las Vegas, I had been partying with a bunch of Japanese business men.  During this time all the pain killers wore off.  Mr. Nagasaki and I where playing Russian roulette with our business ties wrapped around our heads.  He wore red for good fortune.  I had my Oxford navy blue on that night.  It was my turn and I was not feeling lucky.  Click!  Not today Mr. Reaper.  Mr Nagasaki respected that I went 10 full rounds with him and didn‚Äôt show fear.  He claimed I had a warriors spirit.  We closed on the deal by sun rise we flew in a helicopter to Philadelphia to go and get some bagels that morning.  I then remembered I need to purchase an item and they asked me to download this app.  To be honest I really haven‚Äôt given it a try yet.  However,  I‚Äôm sure everybody at the company is proud of their product and so am I.  Five stars homies!

title: absolutely perfect!!
text: as an impatient kpop collecter, this app is so useful to me, not only do I get multiple notifications per day, but I also get to see exactly where my package is at any moment of the day!! I also love how shop automatically adds packages for you if you sign in with gmail!! you can also follow different shops near you, weather its online or in person!! sometimes notifications are delayed, but when your package arrives, shop makes sure that you get your notification as soon as it enters your house ( multiple occasions I went out to get my package and the mail lady was still there). I definetly would reccommend this app to anyone who orders a lot online, especially if you are impatient, because it is definetly reassuring to see how close your package is!!

title: App is useless
text: This app does the same thing that just have a tracking number from the shipping company does. Only difference is the shipping company is accurate within 24hrs normally. I have an order in this app that was delivered over 8 months ago the app finally updated saying it was delivered about a week ago. Also pretty apparent that you are collecting info for 3rd parties why do I need to give you permission to all my emails why not just allow me to enter an order number instead of giving the app permission to access all my emails and contacts stored in my email. This app does exactly what was already available with tracking numbers for packages now I just have to let you have access to my emails instead actual rating is 0 stars but apparently that is to mean in society today or so you get a 1 star participation trophy that I hope your dad immediately takes and throws in the trash and tells you how you don‚Äôt deserve it cause you didn‚Äôt do anything to improve on the world.

title: They Insist on Access to Your Email!! NO!
text: I saw all the great reviews, downloaded it and the very first thing it is making me approve to move forward are three VERY DISTURBING things (this is EXACTLY word for word): 1) View your email messages and settings 2) Manage mailbox labels 3) Manage your basic mail settings. They are absolutely psychotic if they think they need to access your mailbox to the point where they can read your messages and even go as far as to change your settings!! I don‚Äôt see how this has ANYTHING to do with tracking my orders, and I don‚Äôt see how so many people have granted them this access either!! I scrolled thru some of the reviews and not one mention of this.. very odd and disturbing. This is WRONG on so many levels. If I could give them zero stars, I would. DO NOT GIVE ANY APP THIS TYPE OF ACCESS!!!

title: Wonderful App with seamless interaction!!
text: I downloaded Arrive about a year ago and have used it to track many items and it has performed amazingly. It was such a hassle to have to download the USPS, UPS, and other external apps to track my shipments. Also I hated having to type in that long tracking number. All of those problems were gone when I downloaded Arrive. It is synced up with my email so any orders with tracking numbers that are sent to me are automatically scanned by Arrive and put into a tracking format for me to view. I also love how the app shows where your shipment is located with the location list and the map. A must download for anyone who enjoys tracking their shipments or enjoys a seamless interface without having to manually do anything on their part (only pressing download)!!!!

title: Not accurate and mostly just ads?
text:
I was invited to download this app by another company to track the progress of an item. After downloading this app I still have zero information about the status of the item, and was mostly directed to buy more stuff from the company who hadn‚Äôt filled/delivered/lost (unclear) the item in the first place. 

But this could be the problem of the initial company who just hasn‚Äôt been able to fill orders so there is nothing to track - the reason I actually deleted the app was that I poked around to ses the information related to OTHER orders that had already been filled or I already was aware of their progress.  In those circumstances (not every purchase automatically appeared I don‚Äôt know why some did some didn‚Äôt) ever single status seemed be wrong. Etsy deliveries that I got months ago showed undelivered, ‚Äúordered on‚Äù dates were actually in the future (and, also strangely, showing as delivered).

The piece that seemed to work seamlessly was the interaction with other sites to buy products.

Perhaps by playing around and linking more information into this system things would get more accurate - however it‚Äôs difficult for me to justify investing that time when most companies are forthright about shipping delays (in the event you don‚Äôt have a tracking number) and entering a tracking number through USPS / FedEX / UPS is simple and straightforward and provides all the info you need.

title: 30 Days to Receive My Order!
text:
I did not realize that I was placing an order from a merchant outside of the United States.  If I had known I would have never ordered.  It took exactly 30 Days to receive my order, which were (2) pairs of shoes. I received them today.  When I opened the bag both pairs of shoes smelled had a very strong smell of chemicals like the smell of gasoline. I am very concerned about the damage from these chemicals and what harm they could do to me if I tried to wear them.  They will be going to the nearest trash dump.  What a rip off!!!!  I  am surprised they cleared customs!  

I won‚Äôt bother trying to return them or request a refund.  I will however write a review on Google and notify the U. S Better Business Bureau that this merchants products are a rip off and a health hazard.

title: Great app!
text: I really like this app. When I otherwise wouldn‚Äôt have a way to see the status of my packages, the shop app is there so I can ensure everything is going smoothly. It‚Äôs very easy to use and I have had zero problems to date. I like scrolling through all my successfully delivered packages and feeling accomplished for buying things that make me happy. Whenever there‚Äôs any shipping issue, I know about it very soon after. I was surprised the other day when I bought something off of a very small website that had a weird way of paying that I‚Äôve never used before and it pulled the information and found the shipping info! So if you‚Äôre wondering about getting the app, what are you doing? It‚Äôs a very useful tool, and you can help plant trees!

title: A great place to shop
text: I have to say that first when I got this app I didn‚Äôt think it was gonna be much of anything! But right away I was amazed to see that you can find wonderful quality products and unique items that not everybody has. There‚Äôs many shops to shop through and many varieties of different things. My daughter has her own nail shop, and I find the most unique charms for the nails and the most unique possibilities for her shop for her and she is thrilled to see everything I get from SHOP! When I tell her, I got her new charm she‚Äôs always excited and Sesn are they from shop mom are they from shop because she loves the charm for unique designs I get from the house thank you shop for helping me by encouraging my daughter to stay an entrepreneur!

title: Scam and waste of time for customers
text: I order from a website and to get tracking they said I needed to download this app. Then I have to create a login and provide access to my emails for some reason  (data mining). Most if not all email providers have automated package tracking. Every web based business is required to provide tracking details but this website that I guess uses Shopify in the background is telling you to go through this separate app to get updates. Then wants access to your email but gives no updates on tracking.  Like why do you need access to my email when you won‚Äôt even give me tracking information?? There is nothing in my email that they need. Just data mining people‚Äôs personal emails now.  Waste and a scam. Maybe other have reasons for using this app but for the purpose of what I think a lot of people want which is just tracking this is something that steals your data and try‚Äôs to up sell you additional products.

title: INFORMATIVE!! üëå
text: I‚Äôve had this app for a couple of years now and I love it. From the second I purchase anything online I get a notification from SHOP, about a package being prepared for me from wherever I ordered it from. I think that‚Äôs pretty decent! Once the company prints out the Shipping label to it being mailed out I‚Äôm informed on every move which is all I the information I wanted. Once it‚Äôs mailed out you can see in the map we‚Äôre your package is, so this way it‚Äôs impossible to have it go missing. I sell online and for me to have packages go MIA and it‚Äôs happened is just ridiculous and it‚Äôs all costly, but not with SHOP! I no longer have to worry about we‚Äôre my packages, and that‚Äôs exactly what I was looking for in an app. Thank you SHOP for putting my mind at ease!

title: Unexpected!
text: When I first got this app I thought it was gonna be something was slow and complicated. It was not at all! This app allows you to SEE where your packages is on the map. It also throws glitter when you have received your item! I find that little detail delightful, with how the world is today a little confetti goes a long way! The app also allows you to turn off the confetti if you wish! Some of the deliveries may take a while but it‚Äôs not the apps fault it‚Äôs the handler of your package! So don‚Äôt blame SHOP. This app shows you when your packages has been shipped and also an estimated time for it to arrive. It‚Äôs as if you have a real time tracer on your package! I high recommend this app! I have only had it for a few days but I feel wonderful about it. It‚Äôs changed the way I see shipping!

title: I just want to track my package, why do I need an account?
text:
This app hassles your to create a sign in and sign up for notifications (both are unnecessary and can be skipped) before you can even see your tracking info. I don‚Äôt know who thought this was a good idea. It‚Äôd be better if sellers just linked to the delivery company‚Äôs package tracking page.

Edit: Shop claims in their response to this review: ‚ÄúThe reason we ask you to sign up as Shop is much more than just a tracking app. It is also you're shopping companion to help you discover new brands.‚Äù This is laughable - nobody wants to discover new brands in a package tracking app. This is a blatant attempt to cash in on referral fees. My best guess is that the business model is that there is an exchange of value to the business using Shop for package tracking so that Shop can monetize you, the consumer, by collecting the information on all of the items you‚Äôve purchased and using it to profile you. Seems like you should stay away from this app if you value your privacy.

title: Easy to use, great app
text:
I‚Äôve never gone out of my way to write a review for an app, but I genuinely appreciate the hard work these developers put into this app. The interface is very user friendly, everything is organized and easy to use. I‚Äôve also been impressed with the accuracy and quality of the tracking system. 

As well as their quality tracking, I use the Shop Payment system as well. It is highly affordable and easy to use. I can make payments whenever I want, and the due dates for them do not change. We‚Äôve all been tight on money before, but Shop makes it easy for me purchase gifts for my loved ones while still being a reliable and quality oriented app. If I could give it a 6 out of 5, I would.

title: Not as accurate as it needs to be on delivery status
text: The updates on package status are about 24hrs behind. I‚Äôll have received a package at my door at some point during the day, but when I check the app it says the package is still in a different  state in transit? I also wish it would show a picture of the item being delivered to be able to organize my end better to know what is coming to me at a quick glance. I also do not understand how it knows when I have a package coming since it doesn‚Äôt have me enter the info into the app. It does not always give me updates on every item I have coming to me? For example, I ordered something at a market fair with my credit card, and I have no idea when I will be receiving the item and the app doesn‚Äôt have it listed either? I think some things need to be worked out to more accurate and time efficient for users. Thank you for your time.

title: Weakest payment installment option app
text: I don‚Äôt usually write reviews, but stay away from this app. I have had countless times where I‚Äôve tried to purchase an item by installment format, saw it was this app and it completely changed my mind on buying the item. I‚Äôd rather pay full price or not at all. It comes down to the simple fact it won‚Äôt even let you pay for it and scrambles to deny you a reason let you fix the reason to then repurchase, but as soon as you‚Äôre denied it won‚Äôt let you buy again. I‚Äôve used Afterpay and Klarna - neither give me this problem, not as steadily as Shop. I‚Äôve followed the issues whether it could be card, billing, or just account issues, but knowing I can do it any other application except for this one using those same aforementioned variables let‚Äôs me know the service is the only common problem. I wish retailers wouldn‚Äôt partner with them because it‚Äôs a shame there‚Äôs better options and they are using one that will repel buyers.

title: Denture Fit
text: This product is the very best if you have to wear dentures. It makes wearing dentures a lot more comfortable because it is a soft liner and there is no need to use any of the paste products out there. It‚Äôs easy to use and if for some reason you have a problem there customer service is absolutely the very best I have ever worked with. They will put you in touch with a representative that will call you in the comfort of your own home and help you with any problems you have. The service representative that helped me was so kind and patient, his name was Bill and he was so easy to work with. Believe me when I tell you they have the very best customer service ever. At least try this product, you will not be sorry. And never hesitate to reach out for help.

title: Everything
text: This app is such a time saver . I used to order a lot more stuff before and it was a hassle figuring out when they would come etc . Now as soon as I order anything it goes through this app within a couple mins to at most a day . And gives you estimates every time you refresh instead of having to find a tracking number and then going to the carrier and wasting time when shop does it all for you . And for those people that are saying ‚Äú ohhhh it doesn‚Äôt give me a good estimate on when your package is coming ‚Äú ,Well it doesn‚Äôt  hurt to just check it how you would check it if this app didn‚Äôt exist . But this app is a time saver and I will continue on using this app for the long run . Highly recommended.

title: Unable to track all packages, but great nevertheless
text:
This app is a perfect tool for young people who love to shop (like me!!), really simple to use for purchasing or just tracking packages. As a buyer and seller myself, I use this app to track my customers packages AND my personal packages! It keeps me updated and there are sometimes deals exclusive to the Shop app, which is cool. My only complaint is that this app seems to get more glitchy with each update, yes, the new features are awesome/convenient, but at times I will not get a tracking number under an order, making the apps main objective (tracking packages) not very useful. 

I also believe there should be points or a reward program for buying through the app! Just my opinion though :)

title: Only as good as the shipping company integrations.
text:
It would be generous to say this app is on par with uspo or ups tracking pages. I ordered from a medium sized business sept 22, yet after 2 days, Shop app has no information on the order other than ‚Äúis shipped‚Äù. No when, or from what location. However, my vendor also provided a link to the shipping provider (gls). The GLS page does provide some basic info about the shipment. The Shop app also encourages users to register. Registering provides no advantages since again, the order is trackable via the unauthenticated shipping service website. I‚Äôll just be volunteering to leave my identity in yet another random app database I‚Äôll never use again.

[Edit] - and it‚Äôs too late. By installing the app and navigating to my (empty) order tracking page, my vendor passed shop my email and name AND Shop created an account based on my email.

title: Works wonderfully, but. . .
text: I love this app, I use it all the time because I order packages very often. I have noticed that the location on the map of the item being tracked doesn‚Äôt always update, and that I get notifications late. I check the app often so I typically see a change before the notification comes. The app notifies me hours late that a package has come even after I received it and marked it as delivered. There are times I manually have to mark a package delivered as well. Which isn‚Äôt a big deal but it is slightly annoying. I really do love this app tho, and at least 8 times out of 10 it works flawlessly. There is room for improvement, but over all I‚Äôve had a great experience with this app and I love it a lot! I highly recommend the app, especially if you order packages a lot like I do.

title: Mysterious app without rules or guidance
text: I started noticing this Shop Pay while placing some online orders several years ago (most of the products affiliated with it were cheap and bad and several I was able to return). Mysteriously I received an email any now having Shop Cash in my account - of course that‚Äôs exciting and I thought I would look into it soon when I have time.  Only a few days later I received notice that my Shop Cash is expiring - but when I opened that email and looked at the dates, one had already expired and the other (which is set to expire next week) but my Account Balance is 0 so apparently that one has expired early.  To top it off, in trying to learn what this is all about, the #10 Disclaimer literally says Shop Rewards or any of its features may be unavailable, inaccurate or interrupted from time to time for a variety of reasons. We are not responsible for any unavailability, interruptions or errors of Shop Rewards or its features.

title: Used to be great
text: I have loved Shop from the beginning. Being able to track all my purchases one one app is fantastic. However, I don‚Äôt like all the changes over the last year and the push notifications are getting out of control. I don‚Äôt want to shop through this app and I definitely don‚Äôt want to review companies or purchases. That is super annoying and inconvenient. I like the push notifications to tell me my package is out for delivery, but I get so many now saying so many various things that it makes me want to turn them off. If I turn them off, the app becomes basically useless. Some sort of setting would be nice to where I could choose which push notifications I could have turned on would be nice. I only want to use this for tracking packages. Anything else is irritating. I used to recommend this app to everyone and now of someone brings it up, I talk about terrible it is now. Fix it or you will see people start deleting the app!

title: Arrive??? Yes YOU Must!
text: I am an online shopping fanatic! But was always having trouble finding the email from buying BUT only when ordering from ‚ÄúAds‚Äù online. Well I got a notification while purchasing something the other day threw an ad on FB and it was for Arrive, I downloaded, didn‚Äôt notice anything special or that it has AUTOMATICALLY synced my purchase,but  I have the FedEx app and thought hmm ü§î Na, don‚Äôt need it. Well a couple days into my purchase I realized I hadn‚Äôt received a purchase confirmation that I had remembered, so I go to the dreaded email box to start searching, and my first email shown when searched was ARRIVE‚Äôs notifications!!  I hadn‚Äôt set up my notifications to sound or show a banner! I now can literally track ANYTHING I purchase! And I get Arrives notifications before I get company emails!!!

title: Racist bent and pushy shopping experience
text:
I initially tried this app because I thought it would be a good package tracker. The tracking functionality without letting the service access my email account was ok. However, the layout of this app is clearly meant to push people to shop more and spend more. While I don‚Äôt fault Shopify for leveraging this service to promote more relevant options for a consumer, it‚Äôs a bit too pushy. 

The aspect that really turned me off was when the first thing pushed in my face was an offer to shop from businesses only owned by people of one certain color group. That‚Äôs called racism and I won‚Äôt have any part of it. What a horrible thing to do when so many have worked so long and hard to curb racist practices. 

I hope this company didn‚Äôt mean to exclude other races or promote one color as superior to others. But that‚Äôs what the marketing looks like. The only way to defeat systemic racism is to deny racist behavior and it‚Äôs supporters. So I deleted this app.

title: Junk!
text: I just ordered a product from a website that i haven‚Äôt shopped before. When they displayed my order confirmation info, they listed ways to track package. One of the ways listed was Arrive so i figured id try this app since it was supposed to b automated. Got it all set up and it registered past packages that i ordered from other websites before but it didn‚Äôt register package i had just got a confirmation email for. So i tried to enter it manually but couldn‚Äôt do that either bc it requires u to copy the order number from the text inside the email. Problem was the order number for that package was only listed in the email header title not in the body of the email. So i have no way to add that package to Arrive package tracking which was the whole purpose of downloading the app.

title: Order not moving on the map?
text: Hello shop I recently bought an item and when it was getting shipped after a few days the order suddenly stopped near In-N-Out-Burger and never moved for 4 hours and it‚Äôs still not moving on the map and I tried refreshing the app or deleting it and re installing it and it was still in the same place and I‚Äôm thinking the person who is shipping accidentally left the box there when they went to eat or either when they were passing by there they didn‚Äôt close the door properly and the door opened and probably flew out or they are slacking it but the app is still very easy to use and if u like looking at your orders getting shipped it‚Äôs the best place I will start shopping at.

title: Track My Package?
text: I ordered a gift for my granddaughter from an online vendor. Evidently it was shipped from China. The online vendor gave me a tracking number from Yum Shipping Co. They provided updates on my package‚Äôs progress from the warehouse to the airport in China. Yum also informed me when my package arrived at the airport in New York. But that‚Äôs as far as their tracking went. The online vendor said if I wanted further updates I would have to download the app ‚ÄúShop‚Äù. So I did. And the only info you can provide is that my package is in transit. Let‚Äôs see. Yum informed me two weeks ago that my package had left the warehouse. And since I haven‚Äôt received it yet I can only assume that it‚Äôs in transit. So why do I need you to tell me what anyone with half a brain can already assume. Where is my package currently? What shipping company has my package: FedEx? UPS? The US Postal Service? What is their tracking number? When can I expect delivery? If the Shop app can‚Äôt provide at least some of this info, what good are you?

title: Not updating from carrier feed
text: I don‚Äôt understand why people are so thrilled with an app that doesn‚Äôt update delivery status often enough. The carrier has had multiple updates yet the app still has the initial shipment status and its‚Äôs been over a day. For a package that is supposed to arrive in less than 48 hours from the time it was shipped, not updating means the app provides me with zero information. It is essentially a list of tracking numbers vs a shipment tracker. I could do this in Notes or even Notepad. Unless you‚Äôve got hundreds of shipments going to your gmail that you want the app to list automatically, this app is fairly useless as once it lists them it doesn‚Äôt update the status. Suggest they come up with some method to make some money to get funding for the development team. The UI is really good, but with the basic functionality essentially non-existent I can‚Äôt rate it low enough. Was really hoping to use Arrive over Deliveries as the app looked great, but I got fooled by the looks. Headed back to Deliveries.

title: Keep track!
text: I was a little wary of this app at first. I didn‚Äôt think that I‚Äôd be using it very often but to my surprise, I order online more than I thought I did! Using this app to keep track of my shipments is actually rather useful. If it doesn‚Äôt show up on the app automatically, I input the tracking number and as easy as it sounds, I know the status of my products. I order from multiple different websites and they don‚Äôt all deliver using the same service so being able to just put my tracking number in and not having to go search through my emails to constantly find the status is a major plus. I don‚Äôt always remember to flag the emails so maybe that‚Äôs my fault but this app just simplifies it all so it doesn‚Äôt really need to be a concern of mine anymore.

title: Inadequate information
text:
The tracking doesn‚Äôt keep track of all the senders. It also doesn‚Äôt track when a package is transferred fro one carrier to another these transfers make for multiple tracking numbers showing on Arrive equalling multiple delivery notifications for the same package with no way to know that it isn‚Äôt more than one package. If you have a lot of packages delivered then many of the Arrive notifications do not show what package each notification represents or if it‚Äôs multiple notifications for the same package. 
When you get two notifications with two different tracking numbers saying the two packages have been delivered it is very frustrating. Especially after you waist hours trying to track down the missing package. I spent one hour and forty two minutes on the phone today trying to find a package that was supposed to be delivered. Now I think it could be the situation I mentioned above. 
I‚Äôm very frustrated.

title: How Can I Delete Tracking?
text:
I have two orders that I cancelled because the company was horrible and never shipped. Because they never shipped, there‚Äôs never been a tracking number so these two orders just say waiting for details and no location details. There‚Äôs no option for me to delete them because there‚Äôs no information. So for a month now I‚Äôve have these two orders just chillin on my shipments, I sent screenshots into the feedback section which hopefully will help. 

Other than that I would give this five stars. I sell on Ebay and Poshmark and linked that email to this app as well. So I can make sure the things I ship out get delivered and I use it for my own personal things that are being shipped to me. Super easy to use, everything just comes straight from your email!!

title: Trust and Patience
text: Initially I ordered the wrong item and they quickly refunded my money. Now my choosing the wrong item may have been the way their site is set up and that took my next order a considerable amount of time to arrive. All of my notes to either the company or the delivery service were ignored, okay not responded to but I could see it was in route. By today I had given up hope on it and was worried when I would ask for my money back that would take at least six weeks to happen but as I stepped into the vestibule there it was, my so wanted package. Well, I set it up quickly and right away made my first two recordings for my show Artitude, a weekly show which will air soon. Thanks to Alsopro! Well, no news proved to be good news as I have always believed.

title: Not reputable
text: So I downloaded this app because some of the stores I frequent and know are in it.  I thought it would be a good fit for my shopping needs.  Well I ordered and it was working great.  Tracking and getting my orders.  I decided to shop through the actual app. I figured the stores had to be backed. No. Not at all. 2 shops I ordered from have to be from china.  They were ordered on 7/27 and I am writing this review on 9/05. I have not received the order. I contacted the stores.  Nothing. They want me to email my card number for a refund. Who does that. They see my order.  It shows landed in US and that is it. Just went to put a complaint in shop app and guess what, they don‚Äôt back their stores. It is the stores responsibility to fix.  Well that is ridiculous. So be very aware. I have now lost over $100 and won‚Äôt get it back. I will give them a week to get fix and then I will disable this app and my friends I encouraged‚Ä¶will as well. I suggest you do too!!

title: MAJOR security concerns
text: I have purchased from various retailers using this app in the past without a problem. However, yesterday I decided to save my new credit card information and went ahead and downloaded the app. This morning I started receiving verification codes sent to my phone-obviously fraud since I was asleep. I checked my credit card and had two purchases totaling over $400. Fortunately there IS order information available on the app so I was able to give that information to my credit card company and use it to file fraud charges with the police department. Obviously something is amiss with the security on this app if someone WHO ISN‚ÄôT ME is able to successfully retrieve the verification codes from a phone that is IN MY HAND. I have emailed the app today with this information, but haven‚Äôt heard back (it is Saturday-so maybe I‚Äôll hear from them on Monday). I will no longer use this app nor will I shop with retailers who use this method of checkout.

title: Great app! Still needs work though.
text: I love that I can track all of my shipments in one place. The only thing that I think needs work is sometimes the status of the package is incorrect. For instance, I can put the tracking number into the USPS website and it will say ‚Äúout for delivery‚Äù or ‚Äúarrives today‚Äù and the Shop app will show ‚Äúarrives tomorrow‚Äù. Or I could track a FEdEx package and on the FedEx site it will say ‚Äúpackage accepted at facility‚Äù but the Shop app will still say ‚ÄúWaiting for details‚Äù. Then some hours later it will finally alert me that the package was accepted at the facility. So it‚Äôs almost like the app is just slow or late to update.  Kind of defeats the purpose if I have to go the actual shipment site for real-time updates. So that‚Äôs why I deducted a star. If that can get fixed, I would give it 5.

title: The best app!
text: I love Shop! I don‚Äôt remember how I found out about it, but it is honestly the best app I have ever used. I can be an impulsive buyer, and can forget about products only remembering months later when nothing actually showed up. Shop keeps everything I‚Äôve ever ordered in one place. Tells me all the information I need to know about the order - like order numbers, shipping details, how to contact the company if needed. It‚Äôs so helpful and so convenient and has probably saved me so much money! Also, it has suggestions of things you‚Äôll enjoy and has a little shopping area in the app. It also keeps track of your favorite shops and products. It‚Äôs just so helpful! I honestly couldn‚Äôt imagine not having this app!

title: trash
text: Wrong product, they have a online help ‚Äúbot‚Äù that gives you literally no information just sends unnecessary messages that you already know. Medaykity is the website i ordered from. They sent me the wrong product over a month ago; i finally received it today. I didn‚Äôt open it due to to their return policy‚Äôs and have emailed them for 3 weeks now, the only thing they say is ‚Äúthe product you ordered is a different style then the original‚Äù i ordered a ELITE SERIES 2 XBOX CONTROLLER and they sent me a blue tooth controller for switch NINTENDO!!!!! They will not answer. Once i have sent them images of the product they were advertising compared to the product they sent me after they asked for it they won‚Äôt respond because they know they are in the wrong. I still haven‚Äôt heard anything back once i called them out on their bull crap. It‚Äôs been over a month now. The product is delivered, unopened, and ready to be returned. Let‚Äôs see if they send me their return address along with a refund as their ‚Äúreturn policy‚Äù states.

title: The app is useless
text: Everytime I order for somewhere and it haves me download this app for it I know I‚Äôm not receiving my item that I paid money for the 1st time I used this I ordered from a clothing catalog it said it was being delivered and I‚Äôve never received it, second thing I ordered was a teddy bear for Valentine‚Äôs Day last year I‚Äôve never received but it states it was delivered I never got a refund or knew what happened to that package, now I‚Äôm onto my final straw I ordered 2 gold chains for 400 bucks and it‚Äôs Marked as delivered and never received them I had to open a case with usps meanwhile someone else must be stealing, or sending them to the wrong address I hate this app with a passion and everytime I order something that involves this place I‚Äôm canceling for now on!

title: Great, except often delayed. So what‚Äôs the point?
text:
As much as I appreciate the UI and want to centralize my shipping updates in one place, it seems almost pointless to use this app for any current updates. I‚Äôve found myself using the app, just as a means to access the delivery company‚Äôs updates. Because SHOP almost always shows me very outdated information. And this is with manually entered tracking numbers for DHL, FedEX or UPS. The app will be 1 or 2 updates behind, always. Manually refreshing doesn‚Äôt update the tracking info‚Ä¶ but the tracking link directs me to the page with the current information.

For this app to really serve it‚Äôs purpose, the tracking notifications should at least mirror the delivery company‚Äôs currently available information. I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs obvious, but I see it‚Äôs been an ongoing issue since the start. That gap in time with notification makes this app almost pointless.

title: Used to be Great 5/5...now....
text: I‚Äôve had this app for at least a year. When I first got it I believe it was called something else. However, the shipping,tracking, notification, and delivery system were all very accurate and I loved it. Now not so much. Let‚Äôs first start with the fact that it now requires a gmail account for tracking? Not everyone uses gmail. And it worked perfectly fine without the use of a gmail account for tracking before hand. On top of that-if you try to add a gmail account (like I have on several occasions) no updates to tracking are done. I shop at small boutiques, and they don‚Äôt always send tracking information directly to the customer-they rely on apps like these to connect the dots. But it‚Äôs gotten to the point that both small boutiques and larger online retailers I am having to reach out and directly ask for my tracking information as the app no longer supplies it/updates orders regularly.

title: TERRIBLE TRACKING AND FRUSTRATING TO USE
text:
I have never had more problems with a tracking app then I do with this one. I only ever seem to get things that track through this when I order something that is coming from overseas. Usually taking extremely long to get here so I am always curious as to see where it is and for how long. 
The tracking usually stops after ‚Äúarrived at sorting facility‚Äù and then I may never get an update until it arrives.
 My most recent purchase gave me a number and the same thing happened. After it‚Äôs sitting at the sorting center for 20 days(omg whyyy!!!)I got a new tracking number from the company I had ordered my items from. I went to edit the purchase in the app with the new number so it would track the right one and it keeps reverting back to the original number. Or when I press update it never finishes loading.
 Extremely frustrating since I ordered my package nearly a month ago and I am still waiting for it and now can‚Äôt even see where it‚Äôs at.

title: Wants access to my Gmail account? No thank you!
text:
First of all, I was asked to download this app in order to track the shipping on my order. but once I finally got it all set up, all it showed me was that my order had, in fact, been ordered... üòí No shipment status or tracking info whatsoever.

Second, and more importantly, it asked to read my Gmail account, allegedly to better track shopping-related emails. At least they were open about why they wanted access to my info ‚Äî I sincerely appreciate that. And, to be fair, there was an option to continue by granting them access to my Apple iCloud account (!?) or, in really tiny letters at the very bottom of the page, to continue by only verifying that I own my email address. I‚Äôm usually pretty comfortable with sacrificing small portions of my online privacy as a trade off for convenience. But wanting to read all my emails in order to track my shopping habits? That seems like gross overreach, and instantly made me skeptical of everything else about this app.

title: THE WORST STORE TO EVER TRY TO BUY ANYTHING FROM.
text:
I had placed my order with several items. I had received an email saying that they had received my order, and then I check my email a few days later saying that the order had been cancelled due to ‚Äúunforeseen circumstances‚Äù. I had then called Windsor, the lady on the phone said that my billing information didn‚Äôt match up with my card (which makes no sense, considering I had looked at my bank app, and it showed that Windsor had taken the money out for this purchase... they told me it would take 2-10 business days for the money to reflect back into my account, here it is two days later, not 10 but the money should have already been put back into my account. Whatever you do, DO NOT order from Windsor. They will scam you online.
 
-A very unhappy customer who just wanted her items,  & will no longer try to place an order with this store. 

-My only option was to select a 1 star, but if I had the choice to select zero stars that would be my choice.
